author: wddgit
body:
#### PR description:

PR #48767 was recently merged and added an algorithm enforcing consistent process order in file merges. The algorithm didn't properly handle a corner case. This PR fixes the bug. It was recent enough and hitting the corner case rare enough that this likely has not affected anything.

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1541

#### PR validation:

Added to the unit test an extra section for this case.
title: Fix corner case in processingOrderMerge
